name: ERROR 404 (LunarlessGameStudio)
description:
Your Computer has a virus and its your job to save it from death.

 In ERROR 404 you play as a computer program robot whose job is to find the virus plaguing the system and eliminate them, all the while the virus slowly works to destroy the computer.   To eliminate virus left-click to stun the virus and then right-click to pick them up and move them to the furnace where they will be used to keep the computer running.
